Officer Training Sign up for motorcycle officer training today. I think TEEX provides first responders and other agencies a great platform to get real first hand knowledge as well as hands on knowledge to things that we might face in the field. I think the training they provide is invaluable. Shawna Davenport STUDENT SUCCESS STORY TEEX has been monumental in ensuring the training needs of my department have been met. Their staff are exceptional and they are always willing to share their knowledge to ensure the betterment of emergency services. STUDENT SUCCESS STORY Dan Kramer Over the past 18 years, I've had numerous classes through TEEX. Every class, no matter what the content, was always presented professionally and the Instructors were knowledgeable of the material, made the classes interesting and informative. There's a great group of people training multiple disciplines: Fire, Law Enforcement, EMS and many others. Keep up the great work. Ryland Ruffner STUDENT SUCCESS STORY I like the fact that they provide free training in all types of subjects to help first responders and those if us that volunteer in different capacity to prepare for local and national emergencies; by proxy, it helps me educate my family, friends, neighbors, and even my clients. Wanda Chaparro STUDENT SUCCESS STORY The Leaving Your Legacy Leadership Course is a real good course. It covers all the bases, I have applied it to my professional life, as well in my personal life. Being able to lead with confidence and empathy. Also balance your work with personal. Two thumbs up for TEEX and the Leaving Your Legacy Leadership Course. Albert Gonzalez STUDENT SUCCESS STORY Great course with a variety of disciplines to choose from. Both online and in person content is quality stuff. These courses and resources have made a positive impact on our community. Eloy Vega STUDENT SUCCESS STORY MGT- 314 I took the MGT-314 course a couple of years ago. I think it should be considered the Capstone course for all of the FEMA courses. It lets you see and experience how all of the components that you learn about in the various courses do actually work together to work thru a situation Tracy Kruger STUDENT SUCCESS STORY I took the MGT-314 course a couple of years ago. I think it should be considered the Capstone course for all of the FEMA courses. It lets you see and experience how all of the components that you learn about in the various courses do actually work together to work thru a situation. Shawn Treloar STUDENT SUCCESS STORY MGT-314 I took the MGT-314 course a couple of years ago. I think it should be considered the Capstone course for all of the FEMA courses. It lets you see and experience how all of the components that you learn about in the various courses do actually work together to work thru a situation. Shawn Treloar STUDENT SUCCESS STORY MGT-314 I was dreading the long days of sitting in class learning. Surprisingly, I never got sleepy and was attentive because the sessions were so engaging. I left full of knowledge, understanding and confidence in knowing how to make a better tomorrow in my position and organization. Patricia J. STUDENT SUCCESS STORY EDP100 Basic Economic Development

ABOUT TEEX

Your training will impact more lives than just your own. At TEEX, we believe that the better prepared you are, the more lives you can influence in your community.

Emergency responders and public servants, including firefighters, law enforcement personnel, public works professionals and cybersecurity specialists, choose TEEX for training because of our facilities and knowledgeable instructors.

At TEEX, our training facilities provide an immersive learning environment, and our realistic simulations ensure you’re prepared for the challenges you’ll face in your role.

Our instructors are professionals with real-world experience. They offer industry-relevant training, practical insights and guidance that empower you to confidently apply what you learned.

When you choose TEEX, you’re gaining a partner dedicated to your professional development and safety and the well-being of your community. Join us in our mission to create a safer, more prepared world.
